actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: A bill to enable the United States to contribute its share of the expenses of the International Commission of Control and Supervision as provided in article 14 of the protocol concerning the said Commission to the Agreement on Ending the War and Restoring Peace in Vietnam.

summary.text: Authorizes appropriations to the Department of State of such sums as may be necessary for the payment by the United States of its share of expenses of the International Commission of Control and Supervision of the Agreement on Ending the War and Restoring Peace in Vietnam.

titles.title: A bill to enable the United States to contribute its share of the expenses of the International Commission of Control and Supervision as provided in article 14 of the protocol concerning the said Commission to the Agreement on Ending the War and Restoring Peace in Vietnam.
